name: Casino Mega Collection
description:
Casino Mega Collection features 60+ casino table games and video slot variations. Enjoy the following games:

  • No-limit Texas Hold 'Em and other casino poker games.
  • Poker tournaments and custom scenarios.
  • Casino Blackjack, Roulette, Craps, Pai Gow, Let It Ride, Caribbean Stud, and many more!
  • Video slots, poker, and keno.
  • Four unique video slots with bonus games.

Features relaxing gameplay that's fun for the whole family.

  • Big cards for easy readability.
  • Customizable interface with modern, easy-to-use design.
  • Multiple skill levels, tutorials, and stat tracking.
  • 25 card backs and 5 decks to choose from.
